name: Sokoban-Like
description:
With your cheese locked in your closet, it's your job to solve five Sokoban puzzles to find the keys to unlock it.

It's not as easy as it sounds, though. You can't undo and restarting will not only send you to back to the start but randomize the puzzles you'll need to solve.

And in typical roguelike fashion, beating the main campaign is just the beginning. There are also unlockable modes, 25 different puzzles to find, and even some bonus content that pays homage to the original Sokoban!

Made for the UMD February Game Jam 2022.
